page.title: 18People and Health.
page.content: No Hospital in area, people travel to West Suffolk Bury St Edmunds, Colchester Hosp., St.Leonards or Walnutree in Sudbury. People register with Dr. in Sud. or Hedingham- Dr will still do home visits. Well baby clinics at Halstead, but Health Visitors & community Nurses visit at home. Hosp. car service & ambulances available for travel but 'good neigh- bours' help too. Fair amount of intrest in healty wholefood eating and alterative medicine. There is a definate social hierachy but edges are becoming more blurred, due to influx of 'weeekenders' or townspeople to villages. Aprox 170 people live in B. Walter. Aprox 120 people live in B.Otten. B.Walter mainly elderly + weekenders only 2 or 3 families with children. B.Otten more middle aged, more fam. with children.
